definition: Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
morning

sentences.english: Lin Zexu (Lin Tse-hsu ) was a Chinese scholar and official during the Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 林則徐是清朝的學者和官員。

sentences.english: At Qing Dynasty, it was a part of Shengjing Imperial Summer Resort.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一座城寨清朝時爲盛京圍場一部分。

sentences.english: Qianlong was the emperor of Qing dynasty.
The Huang Taiji Period was the important stage that the Qing Dynasty political power turned from armed administration to literary administration.
sentences.chinese: 皇太極時期是清朝政權由武治向文治轉變的重要階段。

sentences.english: Oing dynasty was a unified multi-national dynasty of the last one of our country.
sentences.chinese: 清朝是我國最後一個統一的多民族封建王朝。

sentences.english: After the overthrow of the Qing dynasty, Shanxi was held by warlord Yan Xishan.
sentences.chinese: 清朝被推翻後，山西被軍閥閻錫山佔領。

sentences.english: You can see that the "Emperor" of the authority and court ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏可以看到“清朝皇帝”的威嚴和朝廷儀式。

sentences.english: It was built in 1535 and restored during the Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 它建於1535年清朝年間曾重新修繕過。

sentences.english: Theart of embroidery had its heyday in the Ming and Qing dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 在明朝和清朝，刺繡藝術達到全盛期。

sentences.english: This is a performance in a teahouse of Beijing .
sentences.chinese: 這是北京老茶館裏上演的一段表演，清朝宮廷舞。

sentences.english: Is invent from China, and the flag is Qing empire vouchsafe to you.
sentences.chinese: 八卦是中國發明的，而且這個國旗是清朝授予你們的。

sentences.english: The history of our school remounts to the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校的歷史可以追溯到清朝。

sentences.english: Then came the Manchus, who set up the Ch'ing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 然後滿洲人來了，建立清朝。

sentences.english: In the Ming-Qing period traditional children history education encountered many impact and challenges.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的童蒙歷史教育在清朝晚期遇到了衝擊和挑戰。

sentences.english: The third interpretation attributes the practice to Fu Jin, the Princes of Gong of the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三種解釋跟清朝的恭親王福晉有關。

sentences.english: Our forces have at last defeated the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 清朝政府最終被人們用武力推翻了。

definition: Manchurian Qing (refers to the Qing dynasty, esp. at its decline, or as an anti-Qing slogan)
